code: import axios from'./index';export var createCheckInAttendances=function createCheckInAttendances(user,shift,note){return axios.post("/attendances",{user:user,shift:shift,note:note});};export var getListAttendances=function getListAttendances(){return axios.get("/attendances");};export var deleteAttendaces=function deleteAttendaces(id){return axios.delete("/attendances/".concat(id));};export var checkOutAttendances=function checkOutAttendances(id){return axios.post("/attendances/checkout/".concat(id));};
